name: Classic Japanese Monster Castle 2
description: Classic Japanese Monster Castle 2 is the sequel to Classic Japanese Monster Castle. It is set in Kurumulik Forest. The player's character needs to travel through a forest, moving left to right, as several single-screen rooms are connected horizontally using the flip-screen mechanic. The forest is at the exit of the castle of the first game and he needs to get through it to reach his grandfather's cabin. One of the opponents to get past is a faceless woman with an extendable neck. The player's character can only move and jump.
